item.description:
We'll be meeting for dinner at 6:30pm at Rock Bottom Brewery, then we'll walk over the the AMC Lowes Theater on Boston Common for the 8:45pm movie. It's only a short walk, so wear you can wear your heels ladies! After the movie, we'll head out for drinks- location TBD.

IMPORTANT: You must get your own movie ticket. Please get them in advance, as it will sell out. You can purchase your ticket online through Fandago. Fandango Movie Tickets

This will be a great night- hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside Rock Bottom by the entrance. I'll be carrying a red purse. If late, look for us at a table or call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Let's celebrate the new Sex and the City movie with a fun night out in Boston. Ladies, let's get dressed up in our sexy summer outfits. Guys- yes, it's a chick flick, but why miss a chance to hang out with lots of totally cool chicks?
item.name: Sex and the City Movie Night, Drinks and Dinner
